version_description: - In-Restaurant Pay Feature Disabled Temporarily
- Canada Orders/Login/Location Finder are processed via order.subway.com

Improved Store Finder scrolling experience.
Improved Call Us experience.

The new and improved SUBWAY® App allows you to:

•Customize sandwiches and salads - just like you would in the restaurant
•Save your favorite order making reordering a breeze
•Find everything you need to know about a SUBWAY® restaurant all in one place
•View nutritional information for subs and salads
•Add a sandwich with suggested toppings directly to your bag
•Quickly pay for your order with the mobile App or when you’re in the restaurant via our enhanced payment feature

The new and improved SUBWAY® App allows you to:

•Customize sandwiches and salads - just like you would in the restaurant
•Save your favorite order making reordering a breeze
•Find everything you need to know about a SUBWAY® restaurant all in one place
•View nutritional information for subs and salads
•Add a sandwich with suggested toppings directly to your bag
•Quickly pay for your order with the mobile App or when you’re in the restaurant via our enhanced payment feature

Bug Fix:
•Fixed a bug related to login

This version includes several bug fixes and performance enhancements, including:

•Fixed a defect involving split tender payments and Subway® Gift Cards
•Users may now properly add PayPal as a payment method within the payments wallet
•Fixed a few defects affecting store locator screens
•Fixed a defect that prevented promotions from appearing properly

This version contains a variety of enhancements, bug fixes, and performance improvements.
• Log-in has been enhanced with additional security.
• Our log-in screen now includes options that are more clear and user-friendly.
• Fixed a bug that prevented first-time users from seeing valuable tips on how to customize their sandwiches. The sandwich-building process, including removing items, should now be more clear and user-friendly.
• Enhanced the quality of numerous sandwich and ingredient images -- so they look as tasty as they should! 
• Fixed a bug that affected some guests when placing orders in late evening hours.
• The “Order Ready!” animation is now only shown for the first 15 minutes after the order has been prepared.
• Added new FAQ content to help guide guests with questions about our new mobile app.
• Bread names now appear correctly in the sandwich Customizer
• Added a “Remove” option to the ingredients detail view within the Customizer, providing an additional option for guests to remove ingredients from their sandwiches (guests can still “Swipe Left” to remove ingredients, too!)
• Fixed numerous smaller bugs
This version contains a variety of bug fixes, and performance improvements. More updates are on the way soon, so stay tuned!

This version contains a variety of enhancements, bug fixes, and performance improvements.
 
• Introduced some enhancements to our customizer – it’s now even easier to build your favorite Subway sandwiches.
• Updated and improved images so that our sandwiches look as tasty as they should!
• Fixed a large number of smaller issues, including one that impacted late-night ordering for some guests.

This version includes several bug fixes and performance enhancements, including:

•Users can now easily access tips for using our Customizer – tap ingredients to change them, or swipe left to remove!
•After placing an order, users can now more consistently and conveniently access driving directions
•Users can now easily customize wraps
•Numerous smaller enhancements were introduced as we listen to feedback from our users

This version of the app includes:
-Security enhancements for our log-in process (you may need to log in again)
-You can now set your Subway Card as your default payment method
-Other fixes and enhancements, including some fixes that address feedback around our checkout process

Some exciting features in this release! Including:
- You can now order your favorite item – from any location! (And all of your recent orders are still available to reorder with one tap from your favorite restaurants!)
- Looking for a Breakfast spot with Drive-Thru? You can now search for restaurants using multiple filters!
- We made a slew of screens more usable and responsive, including our Dashboard, Bag and Customizer!

Some exciting features in this release! Including:
- You can now order your favorite item – from any location! (And all of your recent orders are still available to reorder with one tap from your favorite restaurants!)
- Looking for a Breakfast spot with Drive-Thru? You can now search for restaurants using multiple filters!
- We made a slew of screens more usable and responsive, including our Dashboard, Bag and Customizer!
- Fixed a bug related to performance

The latest version of the Subway app has some seriously delicious improvements!

•Find a Subway, anywhere! Find the Subway that’s closest to you, or a restaurant near any town or city you’re traveling to. From Tomato, Arkansas to Sandwich, Illinois, to Turkey, Texas – we’ve got you covered!
•“Uh-oh, something went right!” We’ve scoured our errors, fixing many of them, and making dozens of pop-ups more instructive. You should encounter fewer errors, and when you do, our latest release will help guide you towards solutions.
•Show me the money! Your Subway Card balance now shows more prominently, so you know how much you’re able to spend when ordering sandwiches and other tasty items on-the-go.
•We’ve cleaned up some crumbs. This release also includes lots of other tidying inside the mobile app.

Here’s what’s tasty in this release:
• Everything is better with bacon! Or avocado. Or pepperoni. Or more meat. It’s now even easier to add Extras to your favorite subs!
• Enjoying the Subway App? Of course you are! We’ve made it easier to rate the app and provide feedback.
• Our store locator results are now more consistent, and we’ve resolved a number of other small issues.
Oops! This release fixes some issues for our French users. Apologies and thank you!

In honor of our new Signature Wraps (which are flavor-packed with Double Meat!), this release is HUGE.

* This is How You Wrap! Order from our new line of Signature Wraps using the SUBWAY® App. Available at participating restaurants.
* That’s just the start of our “Menu” improvements! The SUBWAY® App has significantly improved its ease of navigation. With the Menu icon in the upper-left, all of your favorite actions are just a tap away.
* First time’s a charm! We’ve added an animated tutorial of our Customizer for new users. It’s also easier to toast your sandwich.
* Bag it! Our checkout page has been overhauled to make reviewing and editing easier.
* Loaded with Extras! You’ll notice lots of other enhancements, including a branded animation when screens take a second to load.

Here’s what’s tasty in this release:
• Everything is better with bacon! Or avocado. Or pepperoni. Or more meat. It’s now even easier to add Extras to your favorite subs!
• Enjoying the Subway App? Of course you are! We’ve made it easier to rate the app and provide feedback.
• Our store locator results are now more consistent.

In honor of our new Signature Wraps (which are flavor-packed with Double Meat!), this release is HUGE.

* This is How You Wrap! Order from our new line of Signature Wraps using the SUBWAY® App. Available at participating restaurants.
* That’s just the start of our “Menu” improvements! The SUBWAY® App has significantly improved its ease of navigation. With the Menu icon in the upper-left, all of your favorite actions are just a tap away.
* First time’s a charm! We’ve added an animated tutorial of our Customizer for new users. It’s also easier to toast your sandwich.
* Bag it! Our checkout page has been overhauled to make reviewing and editing easier.
* Loaded with Extras! You’ll notice lots of other enhancements, including a branded animation when screens take a second to load.

Introducing: Subway MyWay™ Rewards!

* Earn while you eat! Get 4 tokens for every dollar you spend, and collect a $2 Reward every 200 tokens. You'll also get surprises and special offers!
* This Is How You Wrap! Order from our new line of Signature Wraps. Available at participating restaurants.
* That’s just the start of our “Menu” improvements! We've significantly improved our ease of navigation. With the Menu icon in the upper-left, all of your favorite actions are just a tap away.
* First time’s a charm! We’ve added an animated tutorial of our Customizer for new users.
* Bag it! Our checkout page has been overhauled to make reviewing and editing easier.
* Loaded with Extras! You’ll notice lots of other enhancements, including a branded animation when screens take a second to load.

More tastiness coming your way, courtesy of the latest Subway® app:

- Twinsies! Want two of the same sandwich? No problem, just tap “Duplicate” in your Bag.
- Olive you so much! We’ve made it easier to add Favorite items to your order.

More tastiness coming your way, courtesy of the latest Subway® app:
- Twinsies! Want two of the same sandwich? No problem, just tap “Duplicate” in your Bag.
- Olive you so much! We’ve made it easier to add Favorite items to your order.
- We are continuously improving the app experience and fixed a few defects.

This release focuses on Subway Card enhancements:

* Ca-ching! Now you can reload your Subway Card from right within the Subway app.
* Ca-ching, ca-ching! You can now also transfer your Subway card balance from one card to another.
* We’ve cleaned up our Purchase History and Recent Orders sections into one screen, and resolved a number of other smaller issues.

This release focuses on Subway Card enhancements:
* Ca-ching! Now you can reload your Subway Card from right within the Subway app.
* Ca-ching, ca-ching! You can now also transfer your Subway card balance from one card to another.
* We’ve cleaned up our Purchase History and Recent Orders sections into one screen
* We are continuously improving the app experience and fixed a few defects.
We are constantly improving the app experience and this version addresses a few defects.
In this extra cheese-y release, we made it easier to add more cheese to your sandwich… and while we were at it, tossed in some other slices of goodness. Enjoy!

-MyWay, the easy way! We’ve streamlined our MyWay and Scan-to-Pay designs to make it easier for you to manage your valuable rewards.
-This Is How You Wrap! Swipe left, swipe right, or tap? We’ve introduced a new tutorial for customizing our Signature Wraps.
-Do it for the children! We’ve improved the experience for ordering kids meals through the mobile app.
-We’ve sprinkled on a bunch of other toppings including smaller enhancements and bug fixes.

-MyWay, the easy way! We’ve streamlined our MyWay and Scan-to-Pay designs to make it easier for you to manage your valuable rewards.
-This Is How You Wrap! Swipe left, swipe right, or tap? We’ve introduced a new tutorial for customizing our Signature Wraps.
-Do it for the children! We’ve improved the experience for ordering kids meals through the mobile app.
-We’ve sprinkled on a bunch of other toppings including smaller enhancements and bug fixes.

Here’s what’s hot in our August release:
- Chips and Sips! We have a new look and feel for adding sides and drinks. Welting in the summer heat? Grab a salty snack or a cool beverage!
- So Many Subways! We’ve made it easier to make sure you’re ordering from the right Subway restaurant. If your pick-up restaurant of choice is inside a Walmart, shopping plaza, mall, or the like, we’ve made it clear exactly where you are ordering from.
- Don’t Sweat It! We’ve added a bunch of smaller enhancements and bug fixes.

Here’s what’s hot in our release:
- Chips and Sips! We have a new look and feel for adding sides and drinks. Welting in the summer heat? Grab a salty snack or a cool beverage!
- So Many Subways! We’ve made it easier to make sure you’re ordering from the right Subway restaurant. If your pick-up restaurant of choice is inside a Walmart, shopping plaza, mall, or the like, we’ve made it clear exactly where you are ordering from.
- Don’t Sweat It! We’ve added a bunch of smaller enhancements and bug fixes.

Go ahead, fall for our latest update! Here’s what’s new:
· Save the Date! We’ve added a new feature that lets you save upcoming deals and MyWay Rewards promotions to your smartphone’s calendar.
· Chips and Sips: Part II. You can now easily make edits to your Sides/Drinks at checkout. No fuss, no muss!
· Mr. Fixer Upper is on it! We’ve added a bunch of mini enhancements and bug fixes.

Go ahead, fall for our latest update! Here’s what’s new:
· Save the Date! We’ve added a new feature that lets you save upcoming deals and MyWay Rewards promotions to your smartphone’s calendar.
· Chips and Sips: Part II. You can now easily make edits to your Sides/Drinks at checkout. No fuss, no muss!
· Mr. Fixer Upper is on it! We’ve added a bunch of mini enhancements and bug fixes.

Our October release is a Thriller!
· Save the Date! We’ve added a new feature that lets you save upcoming deals and MyWay Rewards promotions to your smartphone’s calendar.
· Chips and Sips: Part II. You can now easily make edits to your Sides/Drinks at checkout. No fuss, no muss!
· Dr. Frankenstein is on it! We’ve cobbled together a bunch of mini enhancements and bug fixes.
This release focuses on features for enhanced accessibility. Stay tuned for more updates soon!
'Tis the season at Subway! Send something sweet, “Gift a Cookie” to friends and loved ones this holiday season.

We know what you’re thinking - you couldn’t wait to ring in the New Year with a new version of the Subway® mobile app!
• Was the Season, ‘Tis the Season, Will Always Be the Season. We’ve added a new feature that lets you send Subway gift cards to anyone you’d like, whenever you’d like.
• We added a splash of color here and there. Think of it like confetti.
• We resolved to fix some bugs. And we’re going to stay true to our resolution!

It’s holiday season, and with a couple of taps, you can unwrap the joy of the latest Subway app.
With so many locations for you to find, confirm your pickup location before you get in a bind.
Your rewards, how they sparkle! Your tokens, they sheen! Check up on your order from our new status screen.
So dash away all and update away, then order from Subway to brighten your day.

Check out the chills and thrills in our latest update:
-          You can now browse restaurants before logging into the app! How spooktacular is that?
-          The MyWay Rewards status section of our dashboard has a fang-tastic new look
-          We’ve made it even easier to manage your booootiful MyWay Rewards from the bag!

Want Subway fast? We hear you!
- You can now order your favorites right from the dashboard. Just tap and go!
- You can also now more easily and consistently apply your rewards when checking out.
- The number of items in your bag is now displayed above the bag icon.

Here’s what’s hot in the latest version of the Subway app:
-Make It What You Want! Want your sauce on the side? We’ve improved the experience around “Special Instructions”. We’ve also made it easier to add toppings and extras to your favorite sandwiches.
-LOL! ROFL! Lettuce have a laugh together – we’ve added more jokes to the Dashboard
-Don’t sweat it! We added a number of smaller enhancements and fixed a few bugs
In this release, we’ve made it a lot easier to access and redeem your Subway MyWay® Rewards! We also made it easier to send Subway eGift Cards – who doesn’t want those?

We’re in love with February’s release of the Subway app!

•Hubba Hubba! We made it clearer when Rewards members (which you all are, you lucky ducks) earn bonus tokens.
•True Love! When you add chips or cookies, the specific varieties you’ve added now appear correctly in your Bag.
•Be Mine! We made it easier for users to contact us if they’re having issues.
•Soul Mate! We sprinkled in a variety of other enhancements to make your experience faster and more reliable.
Oops! This release fixes some issues for our French users. Apologies and thank you!

We’re in love with February’s release of the Subway app!

•Hubba Hubba! We made it clearer when Rewards members (which you all are, you lucky ducks) earn bonus tokens.
•True Love! When you add chips or cookies, the specific varieties you’ve added now appear correctly in your Bag.
•Be Mine! We made it easier for users to contact us if they’re having issues.
•Soul Mate! We sprinkled in a variety of other enhancements to make your experience faster and more reliable.

The Subway App is in full bloom. It’s time for Spring to do its thing!

- After a dreary Winter, we thought we’d add some color into the Sauces and Seasonings selection process. Be an artist and Make It What You Want!
- Speed is everything. We’re doing a lot of behind-the-scenes work to optimize performance.
- Additional enhancements and minor bug fixes to make your life easier!

Grab your basket – tons of Easter eggs in this release!
- Save a “Fav”! Forgot to save your favorite Spicy Italian with Jalapeños and Chipotle Southwest? We’ve made it WAY easier for you to save your Favorite items, right after you place an order or anytime through your order history.
- Our menu category images have a brand new look and feel, and we’ve added colorful images for our sauces and seasonings.
- We sprinkled in a variety of other enhancements to make your experience faster and more reliable.
In this release, we’ve made it a lot easier to access and redeem your Subway MyWay® Rewards! We also made it easier to send Subway eGift Cards – who doesn’t want those?
In this release, we’ve made it a lot easier to access and redeem your Subway MyWay® Rewards! We also made it easier to send Subway eGift Cards – who doesn’t want those?

-LOL! ROFL! Lettuce have a laugh together – we’ve added more jokes to the Dashboard
-Don’t sweat it! We added a number of smaller enhancements and fixed a few bugs

- The number of items in your bag is now displayed above the bag icon.

“Hey Siri, order my favorite from Subway®!”  You can now order your favorite Subway® items using Siri – save a shortcut today!

Lots to crave in this new release! We have a brand new look and feel for our Favorites section. We’re also excited to introduce Sliders: Packed with huge flavor in a smaller and cravable size, our new Sliders are crafted on a telera slider roll for the perfect flavor experience. Order yours today with the Subway® app! (And maybe save one as a Favorite, so you can easily order it again! And again! )

Order yours today with the Subway® app! (And maybe save one as a Favorite, so you can easily order it again! And again!)

Check out the chills and thrills in our latest update:
-          You can now browse restaurants before logging into the app! How spooktacular is that?
-          The MyWay Rewards status section of our dashboard has a fang-tastic new look
-          We’ve made it even easier to manage your booootiful MyWay Rewards from the bag!

Gather around the table, friends -- let’s give thanks for the Subway app!

* As you feast at Subway locations across North America, we’ve made it easier to make sure you’re ordering from the right restaurant
* Ditch the dishes? We’ve made it easier to order catering from the app
* There’s also a healthy serving of smaller side dishes and fixins’ in this update, so dig in!

It’s holiday season, and with a couple of taps, you can unwrap the joy of the latest Subway app.
With so many locations for you to find, confirm your pickup location before you get in a bind.
Your rewards, how they sparkle! Your tokens, they sheen! Check up on your order from our new status screen.
So dash away all and update away, then order from Subway to brighten your day.

Happy New Year! Have you made any resolutions for 2020? The Subway App is here to help!
1. Spend time with friends and family – With just one tap, add an extra sandwich for someone special when you’re checking out.
2. Save money - Earning tokens and redeeming rewards is even easier with our new Scan screen.
3. Be adventurous – Travel more, try new things…and wherever you go, stay well fed using the Subway App!

Roses are red, violets are blue; here’s a new Subway App, made just for you!

We’ve made it easier to navigate our app. You’ll find new tabs on the bottom for: “Home,” “Deals,” “Order,” “Scan/Pay” and “More”. Happy tapping!

Download the Subway App to find new deals and special in-app offers. We’ve made the app easier to navigate: you’ll find new tabs on the bottom for “Home,” “Deals,” “Order,” “Scan/Pay” and “More”. Happy ordering!

Download the Subway App to find new deals and special in-app offers. We’ve made the app easier to navigate: you’ll find new tabs on the bottom for “Home,” “Deals,” “Order,” “Scan/Pay” and “More”. Happy ordering!

We’re Here for You.
Download the latest Subway app today, and get the latest features and updates that help you and your family continue to get the delicious meals you love. Subway restaurants are still open across the country for takeout, and we’re happy to keep serving you in the safest ways possible.

Download the latest Subway App for new features to view, add, and manage your offers and rewards, right from your cart. Minor bug fixes, UI updates and enhancements to push notifications all make ordering your favorite meals even easier.

Download the latest Subway App for new features to view, add, and manage your offers and rewards, right from your cart. Minor bug fixes, UI updates and enhancements to push notifications all make ordering your favorite meals even easier.

Download the latest Subway App for new features to view, add, and manage your offers and rewards, right from your cart. Minor bug fixes, UI updates and enhancements to push notifications all make ordering your favorite meals even easier.

Introducing Apple Pay and Curbside Pickup!
Ordering the meals you love is now even easier with Apple Pay, and more convenient with Curbside Pickup. Take advantage of contactless ordering: select “Curbside Pickup” in your cart, tell us your car’s make and model, and we’ll bring your food out when you arrive. Update today for all of the latest features and fixes!

Introducing Apple Pay and Curbside Pickup!
Ordering the meals you love is now even easier with Apple Pay, and more convenient with Curbside Pickup. Take advantage of contactless ordering: select “Curbside Pickup” in your cart, tell us your car’s make and model, and we’ll bring your food out when you arrive. Update today, to get all of the latest features, updates, and bug fixes.

Use the Subway App to get the food you love, quickly and safely, with Contactless Curbside Pickup. Ordering is even easier when you use Apple Pay: Select “Curbside Pickup” in your cart, tell us your car’s make and model, and we’ll bring your food out when you arrive. Update today, to take advantage all of the latest features, updates, and bug fixes.

Now, Curbside Pickup is Even Easier
Get ready for Footlong Season with the Subway App, and order the food you love while staying safe with Contactless Curbside Pickup. This release includes:
- New Curbside Features: Tap your car’s model and color, and then send a message saying “I’m Here” directly from the app.
- Introducing Promo Codes: Take advantage of mobile-exclusive deals at checkout.
- Tap to Toast: It’s even easier to tell us to toast your sub - perfect for a cool fall day.

Seasons Greetings! This update has some delicious presents for you.
- Treat yourself to one of our new Protein Bowls.
- Minor enhancements and bug fixes to optimize your experience.
This update has some minor enhancements and bug fixes to optimize your experience.

Update to get the latest enhancements:
• Browse our delicious sandwiches, salads, and wraps before signing up for MyWay Rewards.
• Ordering Curbside? You can now choose the flavor of your fountain drink, making it even easier to quench your thirst without ever leaving your car.
• Plus, minor enhancements, and bug fixes to optimize your sandwich shopping experience.
Update to get the latest enhancements.
Update to get the latest enhancements.
This update has some minor enhancements and bug fixes to optimize your experience.

Fresh updates to make ordering easier than ever:
• Choose New Contactless Curbside or Pick Up right when you start your order
• Add items to your bag and keep shopping with ease
• Out of stock cookies or chips will no longer appear, so you can pick the delicious cookie you want and know it will be at your Subway
• Decide you want to start over? Clear your cart with one click
We also reduced the size of the app as well. More features, less space, it's a win-win.

Get fresh delivered fast with new Subway Delivery:
• Order your favorite Footlong and get it delivered right to your door.
• Track your delivery in real-time.
• Available at select locations in the United States only.
Plus, bug fixes and improvements to make ordering easier
Bug fixes and improvements to make ordering easier
Bug fixes and improvements to make ordering easier.
Bug fixes and improvements to make ordering easier
Bug fixes and improvements to make ordering easier. Plus, additional fixes to improve new Subway Delivery.

There’s a whole new way to eat fresh with the refreshed Subway app.

This update brings you brand new features to make ordering your favorite Footlong easier than ever.

- Customize Your Way: Make your sandwich exactly the way you want it with a new ordering experience
- Re-Order In A Tap: Get your last order right from the dashboard
- Get Fresh Fast: Choose Pick Up, Curbside or new Subway Delivery
- Discover Rewards & Deals: Find exclusive offers, rewards and more with MyWay Rewards

Plus, a totally fresh look because you have to refresh to stay fresh.
